name: @alexa-multi-agent/content-agent
description: Content Agent for Storytailor Multi-Agent System

scripts.deploy:container: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 326181217496.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com && docker build -t storytailor-content-agent . && docker tag storytailor-content-agent:latest 326181217496.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/storytailor-content-agent:latest && docker push 326181217496.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/storytailor-content-agent:latest && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name storytailor-content-agent-production --image-uri 326181217496.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/storytailor-content-agent:latest
